sense.gloss: to prevent, to suppress (a cough), to hold back (tears), to hold (one's breath), to relieve (pain)
to stop (someone from doing something), to dissuade, to forbid, to prohibit
to notice, to be aware of, to concentrate on, to pay attention to, to remember, to bear in mind
to fix (in place), to fasten, to tack, to pin, to nail, to button, to staple
to detain, to keep in custody

sdata.j: ↑学校↑↓がっこう↓に↑全↑↓すべ↓てを↑求↑↓も|と↓める|ことはできない。
sdata.e: One can't expect everything from schools.

sdata.j: いびきをかくことは↑認↑↓み|と↓める|よ・・・。
sdata.e: I must admit that I snore.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓に↑助言↑↓じょげん↓を↑求↑↓も|と↓める|べきだ。
sdata.e: You ought to ask him for advice.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はタバコと↑酒↑↓さけ↓を↑止↑↓|と↓める|べきだ。
sdata.e: You should give up drinking and smoking.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑失敗↑↓しっぱい↓を↑認↑↓み|と↓める|べきだ。
たばこを↑止↑↓|と↓める|ことがあなたにとって↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓です。
sdata.e: It is necessary for you to stop smoking.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はタバコと↑酒↑↓さけ↓を↑止↑↓|と↓める|べきだ。
sdata.e: You should give up smoking and drinking.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑言↑↓い↓う↑事↑↓こと↓は↑認↑↓み|と↓める|が、↑同意↑↓どうい↓は↑出来↑↓でき↓ない。
sdata.e: Admitting what you say, I cannot agree with you.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑言↑↓い↓うことを↑認↑↓み|と↓める|としても、やはり↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑考↑↓かんが↓えは↑間違↑↓まちが↓っていると↑思↑↓おも↓う。
sdata.e: Admitting what you say, I still think you are wrong.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑言↑↓い↓うことは↑認↑↓み|と↓める|けれども、↑言↑↓い↓い↑方↑↓かた↓が↑気↑↓き↓に↑入↑↓い↓らない。
sdata.e: I admit that what you say is true, but I don't like the way you say it.
